polychemprint3.userInterface.commandLineInterface.ioElement module¶

The UI_CLI_IOElement(ABC) Abstract Base Class specifies the interface for CLI menus

Revised: 6/11/2019 00:34:27
Author: Bijal Patel
class polychemprint3.userInterface.commandLineInterface.ioElement.UI_CLI_IOElement(name, **kwargs)¶

Bases: abc.ABC

abstract UI_CLI_Operate()¶

Do the primary purpose of the CLI element | Parameters | none

Returns
none or flag, an optional string which reflects how operation terminated
UI_CLI_Prompt(promptString, validate=False, validResponse=[], caseSensitive=False)¶

Prompts user for input and optionally validates against a list of options | Parameters | promptString, String to display as prompt | validate, Boolean for whether to validate input | validResponse, list of valid input strings | caseSensitive, whether prompt should be case sensitive

Returns
inputString, inputString from user
